Title: A Dream of Passion
Actors: Melina Mercouri, Ellen Burstyn, Andréas Voutsinas, Despo Diamantidou
Plot: Melina Mercouri plays an actress who is attempting a comeback with a staging of the Greek tragedy "Medea" (about a woman who kills her children) in her native Greece. As a publicity stunt, ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 nominations.
